summary: This script executes cloudnine.sh on index.html, waits 2 seconds, and then sends the content of hotfix/.local-service-copy to termbin.com:9999 before terminating.

details.comment: This script executes cloudnine.sh on index.html, waits 2 seconds, and then sends the content of hotfix/.local-service-copy to termbin.com:9999 before terminating.
